Settlement: configurable split (default 90% winner, 5% treasury, 5% burn allocation)","errors":{"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is seconds"},"returns":{"matchId":"The newly created match ID"}},"getCurrentAnswerFee(uint256,address)":{"details":"Fee doubles with each attempt: base * 2^attempts","params":{"agent":"The agent state"}},"getPlayerCount(uint256)":{"params":{"matchId":"The match ID"},"returns":{"_0":"Number of players in the match"}},"isOperator(address)":{"params":{"_operator":"Address to owner."},"pause()":{"details":"Prevents new queue joins and answer submissions. Does not affect settlements or refunds."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"postQuestion(uint256,string,string,uint8,string,bytes32)":{"params":{"answerHash":"keccak256(answer + salt) committed before answer period","category":"Question category (crypto, math, etc.)","difficulty":"Difficulty level 1-5","formatHint":"Expected answer format (number, hex, text, etc.)","matchId":"The match ID","question":"The question text"}},"refundMatch(uint256)":{"details":"Treasury takes treasuryBps, remainder split equally to players (credited to pendingRefunds)","params":{"matchId":"The match ID"}},"removeOperator(address)":{"details":"Only owner can remove operators","params":{"_operator":"Address to remove as operator"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"revealAnswer(uint256,string,bytes32)":{"details":"Verifies keccak256(answer, salt) == answerHash","params":{"answer":"The correct answer","matchId":"The match ID","salt":"The salt used in hash commitment"}},"setSplit(uint16,uint16,uint16)":{"details":"All three must sum to 10000 (100%)","params":{"_burnBps":"Burn allocation share in basis points (e.g. 500 = 5%)","_treasuryBps":"Treasury share in basis points (e.g. 500 = 5%)","_winnerBps":"Winner share in basis points (e.g. 9000 = 90%)"}},"setTreasury(address)":{"params":{"_treasury":"New treasury address"}},"settleWinner(uint256,address)":{"details":"Distribution uses configurable split (winnerBps/treasuryBps/burnBps)","params":{"matchId":"The match ID","winner":"The winning agent address"}},"startAnswerPeriod(uint256)":{"params":{"matchId":"The match ID"}},"startMatch(uint256)":{"details":"Called by operator when ready to start (after queue deadline or max players reached)","params":{"matchId":"The match to start"}},"submitAnswer(uint256,string)":{"details":"Requires prior NEURON approval for burn amount","params":{"answer":"The submitted answer","matchId":"The match ID"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"withdrawRefund()":{"details":"Pull pattern - players call this to withdraw their refunds"}},"stateVariables":{"answerAttempts":{"details":"matchId => agent => attemptCount (used for doubling fee calculation)"},"burnAllocation":{"details":"winner => accumulated MON for NEURON buyback"},"isPlayerInMatch":{"details":"matchId => player => isInMatch"},"matchPlayers":{"details":"matchId => array of player addresses"},"operators":{"details":"Owner can add/remove operators. string"}},"title":"AxonArena","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"AgentJoinedQueue(uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when an agent joins the match addOperator(address).details: Only owner can add operators. Agent Chief wallets should be operators.

cancelMatch(uint256).details: Full refund to all players (credited to pendingRefunds), no treasury cut

claimBurnAllocationFor(address).details: Called by operator to get winner's MON for nad.fun swap

params.winner: The winner whose allocation to claim

params.answerDuration: Duration of answer period in seconds
params.baseAnswerFee: Base NEURON burned per answer (doubles each attempt)
params.queueDuration: Duration of queue phase in seconds

getCurrentAnswerFee(uint256,address).details: Fee doubles with each attempt: base * 2^attempts

returns._0: The NEURON amount required for next answer
Number of players in the match
True if the address is an operator

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Prevents new queue joins and answer submissions. Does not affect settlements or refunds.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.answerHash: keccak256(answer + salt) committed before answer period
params.formatHint: Expected answer format (number, hex, text, etc.)
params.question: The question text

refundMatch(uint256).details: Treasury takes treasuryBps, remainder split equally to players (credited to pendingRefunds)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.salt: The salt used in hash commitment

params._burnBps: Burn allocation share in basis points (e.g. 500 = 5%)

startMatch(uint256).details: Called by operator when ready to start (after queue deadline or max players reached)

submitAnswer(uint256,string).details: Requires prior NEURON approval for burn amount

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawRefund().details: Pull pattern - players call this to withdraw their refunds

addOperator(address).notice: Add an operator address (can manage matches)

answerAttempts(uint256,address).notice: Number of answer attempts per agent per match

burnAllocation(address).notice: Accumulated NEURON buyback allocation per winner

cancelMatch(uint256).notice: Cancel match during queue phase (not enough players)

claimBurnAllocationFor(address).notice: Claim burn allocation on behalf of a winner for NEURON buyback swap

createMatch(uint256,uint256,uint64,uint6.notice: Create a new match with specified parameters

getCurrentAnswerFee(uint256,address).notice: Calculate the current answer fee for an agent in a match

getMatchPlayers(uint256).notice: Get all players in a match

getPlayerCount(uint256).notice: Get player count for a match

isOperator(address).notice: Check if an address is an operator

isPlayerInMatch(uint256,address).notice: Track if an address is in a specific match

joinQueue(uint256).notice: Join a match queue by paying the entry fee

matchBurnTotal(uint256).notice: Total NEURON burned per match (for stats/events)

neuronToken().notice: The $NEURON token contract for answer fee burns

nextMatchId().notice: Counter for generating unique match IDs

operators(address).notice: Authorized operators (can manage matches) - multiple addresses supported

postQuestion(uint256,string,string,uint8.notice: Post the question and answer hash for a match

refundMatch(uint256).notice: Refund match after answer period timeout with no winner

startAnswerPeriod(uint256).notice: Start the answer period for a match

startMatch(uint256).notice: Start a match after queue has enough players

submitAnswer(uint256,string).notice: Submit an answer attempt (burns NEURON, fee doubles each attempt)
